document.full_text: britney spears is poised to score her sixth no. 1 album on the u.s. pop chart next week, although its sales will be sharply lower than for her previous release.
document.title: britney spears set to top u.s. chart despite sales slump
lines_and_colors: britney spears is poised to score her sixth no. 1 album on the u.s. pop chart next week, although its sales will be sharply lower than for her previous release.
